Class MarkLogicRepositoryConnection

    public class MarkLogicRepositoryConnection
extends org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.base.AbstractRepositoryConnection
implements org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.RepositoryConnection

        public com.marklogic.client.query.QueryDefinition getDefaultConstrainingQueryDefinition()
        Returns default QueryDefinition to be used by all queries.
        Returns:
        QueryDefinition

      • setDefaultRulesets

        public void setDefaultRulesets(com.marklogic.client.semantics.SPARQLRuleset... ruleset)
        Sets default rulesets to be used by all queries.
        Parameters:
        ruleset - Var-arg for the default ruleset.

      • getDefaultRulesets

        public com.marklogic.client.semantics.SPARQLRuleset[] getDefaultRulesets()
        Returns default rulesets to be used by all queries.
        Returns:
        SPARQLRuleset[]

      • sync

        public void sync()
          throws MarkLogicRdf4jException
        Forces write cache to sync.
        Throws:
        MarkLogicRdf4jException

      • configureWriteCache

        public void configureWriteCache(long initDelay,
                                long delayCache,
                                long cacheSize)
        Customise write cache interval and cache size. 
        Parameters:
        initDelay - - initial interval before write cache is checked
        delayCache - - interval (ms) to check write cache
        cacheSize - - size (# triples) of write cache
